import React from 'react'; import logo from './HL.ico'; import './App.css'; import { getFullYear, getFooterCopy } from './utils.js'; import Notifications from './Notifications.js'; // Import the Notifications component function App() { return (

{getFullYear()} - {getFooterCopy(false)}

); } export default App;
